feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix helm chart secret to correctly reapply the existing secret by @cstruck in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14983
  • Adding svelte checks to validate ts on build by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15066
  • Typescript in svelte in builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15063
  • Allow standalone field components without forms by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14999
  • Some automation bugs by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15054
  • Add checks for TS in builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15067
  • Typescript in builder by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15065
  • Update automation tests to use the new test builder by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15073

New Contributors

  • @cstruck made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14983

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.12...3.2.13

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Automate Readme OpenAPI updates by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15075
  • Remove rollup usage from pro by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15076
  • Convert client to use vite instead of rollup by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15072
  • Remove references to day passes by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15079

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.13...3.2.14

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Make bigint fields return as string values when fetched through relationships. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15053
  • Update pro ref by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15088
  • Removing Datasource plus query API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15085
  • Remove exited containers when running tests. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15089
  • Always use the current docker context. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15090
  • Bigint cleanup by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15087
  • Clean unused scripts by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15080
  • Remove rollup from bbui by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15074

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.14...3.2.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.2.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix/loop context lost when max iterations are reached. Add/test casesâ€¦ by @imnaveenk in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15091
  • Feature flag zod by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15095
  • Validation for search api by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14757
  • Don't fetch account for identifyTenantGroup posthog event by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15092
  • Patch row improvements by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14949

New Contributors

  • @imnaveenk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15091

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.2.16...3.2.17
